H0.text: Which city in the USA suffered a huge fire in 1871 allegedly started by a cow. Chicago

H1.text: Which city in the USA suffered a huge fire in 1871 allegedly started by a cow. New York City

H2.text: Which city in the USA suffered a huge fire in 1871 allegedly started by a cow. Boston

H3.text: Which city in the USA suffered a huge fire in 1871 allegedly started by a cow. USCHI

A4.text: The most popular tale blames Mrs. O'Leary's cow, which allegedly knocked over a lantern;

A5.text: In 1893 the reporter Michael Ahern retracted the 'cow-and-lantern' story, admitting it was fabricated

A6.text: In 1871, the Great Chicago Fire destroyed several square miles and left more than 100,000 homeless.

A7.text: The Great Chicago Fire destroyed an area about 4 miles (6.4 km) long and 1-mile (1.6 km) wide, a large section of the city at the time.
